Name: Butternut Squash (PH)
Description: It's highly packed with nutrients. According to records, ancient people buried their dead with these to sustain their spirits on their final journey.

DescriptionLocalization.es: It's highly packed with nutrients. According to records, ancient people buried their dead with these to sustain their spirits on their final journey.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: It's highly packed with nutrients. According to records, ancient people buried their dead with these to sustain their spirits on their final journey.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Er ist vollgepackt mit Nährstoffen. Laut einiger Aufzeichnungen begruben früher Menschen ihre Toten damit, um ihren Geist auf ihrer letzten Reise zu stärken.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: It's highly packed with nutrients. According to records, ancient people buried their dead with these to sustain their spirits on their final journey.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: It's highly packed with nutrients. According to records, ancient people buried their dead with these to sustain their spirits on their final journey.
DescriptionLocalization.it: It's highly packed with nutrients. According to records, ancient people buried their dead with these to sustain their spirits on their final journey.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: It's highly packed with nutrients. According to records, ancient people buried their dead with these to sustain their spirits on their final journey.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: It's highly packed with nutrients. According to records, ancient people buried their dead with these to sustain their spirits on their final journey.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Прямо перенасыщена питательными веществами. Согласно писаниям, древние люди хоронили своих умерших вместе с мускатной тыквой, дабы помочь их душам в последнем путешествии.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: It's highly packed with nutrients. According to records, ancient people buried their dead with these to sustain their spirits on their final journey.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 它富含营养。据记载，古人以此祭奠死者，以支撑他们灵魂的最后的旅程。
